choices: you meet up with your gang first
You stop off at your own little hideaway
you just ride around looking for a mark to pick on
1.content:
The alarm goes off and you throw it against the wall. Good thing that clock is strong
or it would have broke long ago. Well time to get up and go rule your own domain.
You get out of bed, take a shower, brush your teeth, and put on your usual 'hoodlum'
clothing as your mom calls it.

Then you hop down the stairs and grab some bacon, eggs, and waffles then start eating your breakfast. Your mother glares over at you and says as usual," I wish you wouldn't wear those hoodlum clothes you could look so nice if you would just dress normal." You smirk at her and say" Sorry I don't wanna look like a dork and besides if i looked normal we would not have this lovely chat every day." She groans and says she has to go or she will be late for work and that you need to lock up and try to behave at school.

So what you are use to her not being there and staying at home alone.You look at the clock and decide to go ahead and go get a little extra lunch money donated to you. It is sooo hard being the enforcer but ohh so fun. You can't say that you don't enjoy being the toughest kid in school but it can be hard to live up to. Well anyway time to go.

You then get on your bike and go to school or maybe somewhere else?
1.title: and you awake

choices: go to school or look around more
15.content:
Forget going to school right now you wanna have a lil bit of fun first. So you ride around looking for the perfect mark so you ride and then see a couple of easy hits.

You see a dorky looking kid wearing some short shorts, a lame t-shirt, and to much hair gel.

You also see a young girl that is about your age and is actually very pretty.

you also see a little kid still in elementary school wearing jeans and wearing a transformers bookbag.

So who do you pick?
15.title: which one?

152.content: You get off your bike and walk over to the girl. Her long blond hair is flowing in the wind. She is talking on her cell phone, her hazel eyes pieced through yours. You walk up to her and say "Hey sweet mama, if I would re-arrange the alphabet, I would put you and I together!" She smiles at you and says
152.title: Pretty

1521.content:
"If I could re-arrange the alphabet I would put F and you together!" You smile, you like a challenge. You walk up closer and whisper in her ear "Its OK we could make a wonderful couple, just you and me,"


She smiles and says "You FREAK!" "You don't even know my name!" Your smile quickly goes away and you say "Well, what is your name?"

" Brooklyn, but just stay away!"
So you....
1521.title: BACK OFF !!

1522.content:
"Well...heeeyyy....." she says closing her phone, "You look like a bad boy" she says.
"Ye I am" you reply "And you look hot" you notice shes still holding her cell phone, "Nice Cell Phone, I want it." you say in a intimidating tone. "No way its mine" she says scared. "Give it" you say demandingly, "NO" she screams. You get angry so you push her down take her phone and get on your bike and ride it into an ally way where you see a______________
1522.title: Well...heeeyyy.....

15221.content: You see a scruffy dog in a box, you walk up to in and rip the box and kick the dog, it yelps and runs off in the direction of an ol man wearing tatty clothing, "You have been a boy boy, Eddie" he yells. "Whats it to you ya BUM" you yell being cocky, "You will pay for your actions" he says waving his hands, i am making you a _________.
15221.title: Old Man

choices: Claire, the girl you picked on earlyier
152211.content: "I am making you a dog untill you do 100 good deads and the only person who will understand you is that girl, Claire whos cell phone you took, and me" he continued still waving his hands. "Ok w'at evea old man you are a nu' job" you say, but then you have a werid sensation in your stomach, you then notice you are growing a tail "What the" you say, your face is pushing out, becoming a muzzle and your ears become pointed, you grow fur and your clothes disapper, you are now a dog, you try to scream butall that comes out is a howl. "you freak and run out the ally way and stright into___________.
152211.title: Dog Now

1522111.content:
You run stright into the girl who you just bullied Claire. "You" you yell. "Ahhh, you you can talk" she screams "ye but your the only one who can understand me, you see i'm the boy who just took your cell phone, i got turned into a dog, look your cell phones on the floor in this alley way" you say leading her to the cell phone, she picks it up. "I've got to do 100 good deads to become human again" you say "you gotta help me". Claire was silent for a second, "Well unlike you i'm kind and helpfull, so i will help you" she says, you sigh with relife, "just got to call my Mom and Dad" she says as she puts the cell phone to her ear.
"Hi Mom, you know mwe were going to get a Dog this afternoon, well i found one i'll take him home now, he was umm.. Free to a good home" she says, then she hangs up."Ok we can keep you, follow me, she says walking to her house. After a short walk, you arrive at her house and see a normal house. You both walk around back and she tells you to stay in the garden while she gets her family, she comes out moments later with her mom and dad, an older bother, and a younger brother. "This is thedog i was on about he was Free to a good home and i liked him" she said "I like him" said the younger brother hugging you, you feel uncofertable being hugged but yelling (or barking now) at him, might get you rejected. "Ok he can stay, but he can stay but he sleeps in _________ room."
1522111.title: New family, with Claire

15221111.content:
"he can stay but he has to sleep in your room clair" says her dad. "but hes a boy!" she objects. "So its not like hes human" says her mum, "he either stays there or goes"she say. "Fine" says Clair, she then walks into the house and gets the collor she brought for the dog she was going to get, and puts it on you. "So whats his name" says the older brother. "umm" she says, "Eddie" you say, luckly on;y she can understand you. "Eddie"she says. "Now the three of you get to school" says the dad. Claire then walks off, you are left with her parents, "well" said her dad "i'll go get some dog food a bed and everything" he says walking off as well you are left with her mom, she then walks inside leaving you in the garden.

You then___________________.
15221111.title: sleep in clairs room

152211111.content: All of the sudden you feel the need to go!! you notice the glass door is open and you run into the house up the stairs and into the bathroom. Then you realize a simple fact. YOUR A DOG. panic hits you as you try to race back outside and then..
152211111.title: no dogs allowed

152212.content:
The memory of meeting the old as crotchety man wearing tattered clothes and seemingly was angered by the kicking of that scruffy little dog meant you were a bully, as then he said something more. It is what the man said that bothers the mind, as it is some instance you cannot fully recall.

No matter as from the sounds and noises around you, you know someone is coming to offer a cool refreshing drink to a thirsty..., who, what, as determining and decide then what the man did to you...?

The clanking sound of metal pans, the shuff sound of a scooper shoved into a sack of tasty food before it is delivered, placed inside a square box made of wood and nailed to the wall of you personal cell. The water poured into a bucket and it hung as well on a hook screwed into the cell wall for you to use to drink, it all seems proper and yet wrong at the same time!

Outside the cell people talk, as inside you cell you listen but the words fail to own much meaning, only a rare few words seem to have your mind realize what was said... this too causes a sense of worry.

Munching breakfast, the uncivilized way the keeper forces you to dip the face to the box and use your tongue to lap-lick up the tasty food from that wooden box. When the food is gone and licked out of every corner of that crude musty scented box, a slurped drinking of the clean water quells the sense of frustration and anger for being jailed.

Soon then they will come and as the keeper did every morning, he entering you cell and without so much as a friendly word said, he clips a rope to that thing someone draped and latched snug about the head, as use it to make you move, to lead, and join then with other prisoners to do as shown, day after new day, boringly repetitious!

A spin-turn and while having to stand as not sit, reaching the head high and straining the neck to stretch, the lips reaching grab at the other other possible food available, that being strands of long, freshly cut grasses.

Coarse kernel grains, fresh cut grasses, a bucket of water to slurp and drink from, totally inhumane treatment and all this because you kicked that dirty little dog?

"Here, stall number nine, the stallion, the boss said to make use of him to breed the mares feeling their time of estrus." A man said, and some of what he said, the mind knew and rational thinking processed, adding new knowledge to a situation cloaked by a forgetful brain.

The sounds then of other prisoners walking past the cell on their way to work a monotonous job of making a machine revolve.

"Lucky boy today fella, Mister Jacobs wants you to perform the way a good pony stallion should, you get to breed-mate four mares today, more tomorrow if you do each a good deed."

The two new words, those being "Good and Deed," they ring a bell in the mind, as you recall the old man and what he said, you needing to do a hundred good deeds before you can become your truer self....wow !
152212.title: A Ponified Fool

153.content: A little girl or boy?
153.title: little kid

info.brief_description: based kinda on the old nick show 100 deeds for eddie mcdowd
info.description:
This story is based on the old nick show 100 deeds for eddie mcdowd. In this story

you are a school bully who angers a drifter who changes you into a dog( or other

animal but be reasonable) and makes you have to perform 100 good deeds to

change back into your former self. I am not trying to make an exact remake of the

story so you can and should have fun with it. I have this rated pg18 since i believe

an artist should have freedom in their creations.. I welcome additions but if

they are stupid, just those one line entries, or just made to be annoying i will

delete. If you want the character can lose deeds for acting up and can find other

transformed animals.

rules
1. this is first person no he ran to the kid

2. the only ones you can communicate with are the drifter, the last person you picked on and other animals.

3. you can have it where you lose good deeds but no negatives the character can go back to 100 at a max

4. i will add to yours if you add to mine

So i hope that people will enjoy this story please commment and rate i appreciate

any review if it is the honest opinion.

PS i thank whoever you are who gave me the gift that they did they know who they are and i do not.
